title: Fatman Scoop - Be Faithful
description: "Be Faithful" is the most popular song by rap artist Fatman Scoop and is his signature song. It features his recurring back-up group The Crooklyn Clan and includes many samples from artists including Jay-Z, Faith Evans and Black Sheep. The single went to #1 in the United Kingdom and Ireland and made the Top 5 in Australia. It is still a favorite among many of his fans.
